recipesJson.name: Daddykanes Muffin Stuffin
recipesJson.author: DaddyKane91
recipesJson.description:
********PLEASE READ - Flavor Monks  Sweet Betsy Cookie is not used in this Mix!!!!!! It is Flavor Monks Sweet Betsy Blueberry,,, ATF does Not have The Sweet Betsy Blueberry in the Archive yet at the time this recipe was posted!!!!*******

Trying a not so complex recipe style today ...
The Flavor Monks Sweet Betsy Blueberry is awesome , Sweet and has a candy blueberriness paired with HS Blueberry for a slight bit of depth and tartness I also chose to layer in some FLV Blueberry muffin to help the WF fluffy white cake SC. 
I chose Wonder Flavors fluffy white cake for this mix simply because i havent used it yet ... so i hope all enjoy ..i will come back and update all my notes after a week ..
